tasks.title: Task 1: Documentation Infrastructure Setup
tasks.description: Set up infrastructure for package documentation: create README template, update Cargo.toml repository links, remove Doxidize, add rustdoc integration, and update main README.
tasks.details: This task establishes the foundation for all package documentation. It includes creating a README template structure, updating all Cargo.toml files with package-specific repository links pointing to subdirectories, removing Doxidize configuration, adding rustdoc include_str! integration pattern, and updating the main README to link to package READMEs instead of containing all content.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify: repository links work correctly, rustdoc includes README content, main README links are valid, no Doxidize references remain.

subtasks.title: Create README Template Structure
subtasks.description: Create a standardized README template that includes: package description, quick start example, key features, API overview, links to docs.rs, usage examples, dependencies and features. Template should be adaptable for different package types (core, producer, consumer, transformer, integration).

subtasks.title: Update All Cargo.toml Repository Links
subtasks.description: Update repository field in all 39 package Cargo.toml files to point to package subdirectories using format: https://github.com/Industrial/streamweave/tree/main/packages/<package-name>. Override workspace repository setting for each package.

subtasks.title: Remove Doxidize Configuration
subtasks.description: Remove Doxidize.toml file and any references to Doxidize in build scripts, documentation, or CI configurations. Ensure all documentation generation uses rustdoc only.

subtasks.title: Add Rustdoc README Integration Pattern
subtasks.description: Create pattern for including README in rustdoc using #![doc = include_str!("../README.md")] in lib.rs files. Document this pattern for consistent application across all packages.

subtasks.title: Update Main README to Link to Packages
subtasks.description: Refactor main README.md to be a high-level overview that links to individual package READMEs. Remove package-specific content and replace with organized links to all 39 packages grouped by category.

tasks.title: Task 2: Core Foundation Packages Documentation
tasks.description: Create standalone README files for core foundation packages: streamweave, error, message, offset, transaction. These are the foundational packages that other packages depend on.
tasks.details: Create comprehensive README files for the 5 core foundation packages. Each README should explain the package's purpose, provide quick start examples, document key APIs, and include package-specific usage examples. Include README in rustdoc for each package.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify: READMEs are standalone and complete, examples compile and run, rustdoc includes README content, links to docs.rs work correctly.

tasks.title: Task 11: Documentation Validation and Finalization
tasks.description: Validate all documentation, ensure consistency, verify rustdoc integration, test all examples, and finalize the documentation suite.
tasks.details: Comprehensive validation of all 39 package READMEs. Verify that all READMEs are standalone, all examples compile and run, all rustdoc integrations work, all repository links are correct, and documentation is consistent across packages.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify: all READMEs exist, all examples compile, all rustdoc includes work, all repository links are correct, documentation is consistent, main README links are valid.

subtasks.title: Validate All README Files Exist
subtasks.description: Verify that all 39 packages have README.md files. Check that no packages are missing documentation. Create a checklist of all packages and verify each one.

subtasks.title: Validate Rustdoc Integration
subtasks.description: Verify that all packages have #![doc = include_str!("../README.md")] in their lib.rs files. Test that rustdoc correctly includes README content. Run cargo doc for all packages and verify README content appears in documentation.

subtasks.title: Validate Repository Links
subtasks.description: Verify that all package Cargo.toml files have correct repository links pointing to package subdirectories. Test that links work correctly and point to the right locations in the monorepo.

subtasks.title: Test All Examples
subtasks.description: Compile and run all examples from all package READMEs. Verify that examples are correct, compile without errors, and demonstrate the intended functionality. Fix any broken examples.

subtasks.title: Validate Documentation Consistency
subtasks.description: Check that all READMEs follow the same structure and format. Verify consistent use of headings, code blocks, examples, and links. Ensure all READMEs link to docs.rs correctly.

subtasks.title: Validate Main README Links
subtasks.description: Verify that the main README correctly links to all 39 package READMEs. Test that all links work and are organized logically. Ensure the main README provides a good overview and navigation.

subtasks.title: Final Documentation Review
subtasks.description: Perform final review of all documentation. Check for typos, formatting issues, broken links, and inconsistencies. Ensure documentation quality meets standards. Create summary of documentation coverage.
